pkgmetadata.longdescription: # JocularJocular is a tool for **Electronically-Assisted Visual Astronomy**.Jocular supports the observation of astronomical objects in near real-time by connecting up a camera to a telescope or suitable lens. It also supports session-planning through extensive deep sky object (DSO) databases, helps to manage your captures, andenables the reloading of previously-captured images.Jocular is documented on Read the Docs.
